title: Stone Game IV
content:
Alice and Bob take turns playing a game, with Alice starting first.
Initially, there are  stones in a pile.  On each player's turn, that player makes a move consisting of removing any non-zero square number of stones in the pile.
Also, if a player cannot make a move, he/she loses the game.
Given a positive integer . Return  if and only if Alice wins the game otherwise return , assuming both players play optimally.
